1.2.name: wordpress/z-lightview
1.2.description:
Allows WordPress to utilize Nick Stakenburg's Lightview for images in posts and pages, including the WordPress image gallery. Lightview provides a clean, simple JavaScript image and gallery viewer.

After installing, the plugin will automatically use Lightview for all links to images and when the WordPress gallery is used. Lightview's use can be configured in the settings page.
